General.Name: Guizhou Zhenhua E chem Inc
General.Description: Guizhou Zhenhua E-chem Inc. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of lithium-ion battery cathode materials for new energy vehicles and consumer electronics in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers lithium cobalt oxide, LCO/NCM hybrid cathod, and lithium nickel cobalt manganese oxide products. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Zhenhua New Material Co.,LTD and changed its name to Guizhou Zhenhua E-chem Inc. in May 2018. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Guiyang, the People's Republic of China.
